title: Can design, italic serif?
content:
Anyone that recognizes this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Skjermbilde%202014-07-29%20kl_6576.%2010.15.27.png)
  
I have tried "What the font" and asked my friends they said to try this forum. :)

Appreciate any help I can get!

Font: 

 MillerHeadline, Bolditalic 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317062845/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: Johannes.Blomgren

comments.content:
Thank you Ryuk, it was!  
MillerHeadline - Bolditalic
